settings.title: Alfa Laval Safety Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval Safety Valve is a flexible and hygienic spring-loaded relief valve. Its main purpose is to prevent pressure buildup in process tanks, vessels, and equipment, which can occur due to blocked discharge, thermal expansion, chemical reactions, or a combination of these factors.

  • Safe, reliable operation
  • Hygienic design
  • Prevents unsanitary leakage and overflow
  • Safeguards both personnel and equipment against accidents due to overpressure
  • Optional manual or automated overwrite for valve cleaning

This safety valve is ideal for use in the dairy, food, beverage,
biotechnology, pharmaceutical and many other industries.

settings.title: Alfa Laval SB Anti Vacuum House
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval SB Anti Vacuum House is a safety valve housing that protects closed process tanks from implosion caused by vacuum conditions during emptying, rinsing, or cleaning. It ensures process reliability, equipment safety, and personnel well-being.

  • Minimal risk of tank collapse due to internal vacuum conditions
  • Fully cleanable via built-in Cleaning-in-Place nozzle
  • Easy to integrate
  • Low investment due to simplified installation
  • Can be combined with other valves in a customized tank top

This anti-vacuum valve housing is designed for use in hygienic
process tanks in the brewery, dairy, food, beverage and many
other industries.

settings.title: Alfa Laval SB Anti Vacuum  Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval SB Anti Vacuum Valve is a compact safety valve designed to safeguard tanks from implosion caused by internal vacuum conditions during various processes like emptying, cool-rinsing, or caustic cleaning in a CO2 atmosphere. Its user-friendly design ensures easy cleaning and fitting onto any closed process tank, enhancing personnel safety, process reliability, and performance while minimizing downtime.

  • Greater process safety
  • Low initial cost of investment
  • Compact design
  • Superior hygiene
  • Easy installation

This safety valve is designed for use in hygienic processes in the brewery, dairy, food, beverage and many other industries.

settings.title: Alfa Laval SB Pressure Relief Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval SB Pressure Relief Valve is a hygienic safety valve that prevents overpressure in process tanks or vessels caused by liquid overfilling. When the tank's pressure exceeds the set value, the valve opens to release excess fluid, ensuring safe operations and preventing damage to the tank.

  • Cost-effective, hygienic design
  • Protection against tank overfilling and pressurization
  • Superior hygiene
  • Customized to meet process requirements
  • Easy to clean

The Alfa Laval SB Pressure Relief Valve safeguards pressurized tanks in hygienic process lines across various industries, including brewery, dairy, food, and beverage. It integrates with the SCANDI BREWÂ® tank top system.
